p: A study in China showed that remdesivir is highly effective in controlling SARS-CoV-2 infection in vitro ( 98). Another study that was recently published involving compassionate-use of remdesivir showed clinical improvement in 68% of patient (36 out of 53) who had severe SARS-CoV-2 infection; 57% were extubated and 47% were discharged ( 99).
